bibl.note: The noun kriyolog€a in declarations by boatmen was used in a collective sense to denote a shipment or cargo of tax-grain that had been cleaned of its adulterating substances. <krithologia>
MAYERSON Philip, kriyolog€a and kriyolog∞nai. Avec résumé en anglais. <krithologia, krithologenai>
